comment._content: Is this photoe the sutcliffe family

comment.author: 67193564@N03
comment._content:
The only information we about who this family is comes from the inscription on the photograph, "4 sons of a prosperous sheep farmer". On the right of the photograph is a note that reads "A bush family, Callaoway". The 'Callaoway' part is difficult to read so we may not have the spelling exactly right, and could relate to the family name, or perhaps the name of their property.  

If you know any more we'd love to hear from you!
